events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to return it because the size doesn't fit and I need a refund.
The customer's request is related to a refund due to a return because of wrong size.
Assigning the case to the Returns Specialist team for processing refund and return request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund and return process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in original condition?
My order number is 987654321. The jacket is brand new, still in the original packaging and tags attached.
Thank you for the details. You can send the jacket back using the prepaid label we will email you, and we will process your refund within 5 business days after receiving the item.
That sounds good, thank you! I appreciate how quickly you handled this.
The refund process has been initiated, and the prepaid return label has been sent to your email address.
Just checking in to confirm you received the return label and if you need any further assistance with the refund.
Yes, I received the label and shipped the jacket yesterday. Thank you for your support!
The refund has been completed successfully, and the case is now closed. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent a customer satisfaction survey to your email. Please take a moment to provide your feedback.
